name: Stunt Typhoon Plus
overview: The set up is pretty standard for a driving game, with the addition of an emergency brake handle to aid in power slides. You select a film to work on, and then you have to perform the stunt sequences (a la Stuntman on the PS2) racing through checkpoints, and avoiding/hitting objects as it requires. Although everything on the machine I played was in Japanese, it was still quite a lot of fun.
